issue.title: [CF 1073] Targettarget is me
issue.body:
Is there any way that TMW can tell me if targets target is me? was thinking for pvp.


> Posted by CurseForge user shisagi | Imported from CurseForge issue #1073 | Raw

comments.body:
Use the unit is unit condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
